server.name: io.github.motherduckdb/mcp-server-motherduck
server.description: Fast analytics and data processing with DuckDB and MotherDuck

packageArguments.description: Port to listen on for sse and stream transport mode
packageArguments.name: --port

packageArguments.description: Path to local DuckDB database file or MotherDuck database
packageArguments.name: --db-path

packageArguments.description: Access token to use for MotherDuck database connections
packageArguments.name: --motherduck-token

packageArguments.description: Flag for connecting to DuckDB or MotherDuck in read-only mode
packageArguments.name: --read-only

packageArguments.description: Flag for connecting to MotherDuck in SaaS mode (disables filesystem and write permissions for local DuckDB)
packageArguments.name: --saas-mode

packageArguments.description: Enable JSON responses for HTTP stream (only supported for stream transport)
packageArguments.name: --json-response

environmentVariables.description: Access token to use for MotherDuck database connections
environmentVariables.name: motherduck_token

environmentVariables.description: Home directory for DuckDB (used as default if --home-dir not specified)
environmentVariables.name: HOME
